query: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(size), 0)::BIGINT as "size!" FROM container_registry_repository INNER JOIN container_registry_repository_manifest ON container_registry_repository.id = container_registry_repository_manifest.repository_id INNER JOIN container_registry_manifest_blob ON container_registry_repository_manifest.manifest_digest = container_registry_manifest_blob.manifest_digest INNER JOIN container_registry_repository_blob ON container_registry_manifest_blob.blob_digest = container_registry_repository_blob.blob_digest WHERE container_registry_repository.workspace_id = $1;
